name: Engage Souls
summary:
Engage Souls is an RPG based on the theme of the new "e Guessing Game".
The story tells of a team comprising five young boys and girls who aim to be professional Engage proponents known as contractors. You Pick from one of six academies and nurture these aspiring contractors and follow their individual stories
